Class Assembly

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.k36.omo.bartom47.smartfactory.core.HierarchyNode<Building,​Worker,​AssemblyConfiguration,​AssemblyConsumption>
cz.cvut.k36.omo.bartom47.smartfactory.assembly.Assembly
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationDataContainer<AssemblyConfiguration>, ConsumptionDataContainer<AssemblyConsumption>, EventHandler, EventLog, EventPropagator
public class Assembly
extends HierarchyNode<Building,​Worker,​AssemblyConfiguration,​AssemblyConsumption>
Represents an assembly in the factory
Author:
Matej
